Store models module.

class sdk.store.models.StoreParameters#

Bases: BaseModel

Store configuration class.

field config: StoreConfig | None = None#

Configuration for the store.

field is_default: bool = False#

Flag to determine if the store is the default one.

field name: str [Required]#

Store id.

field type: Literal['local', 's3', 'remote', 'sql'] [Required]#

Store type to instantiate.
